collection.collection_title: The History of Idaho Broadcasting Foundation Audio Collection
collection.collection_description: The History of Idaho Broadcasting Foundation Audio Collection is a massive assortment of over 950 individual reel-to-reel tapes and audio cassettes from various Idaho radio and television stations. It also includes many tapes provided by individuals who were closely associated with Idaho broadcasting in some way. Audio content includes: \"air-checks\" of actual broadcasts", "commercials and station promos", "musical jingles for various Idaho radio stations, excerpts from taped interviews with newsmakers, as well as tapes of many complete news reports themselves.  There are also some glass and vinyl transcriptions and phonograph records of old radio programs, commercials, and taped musical performances performed by local school and churches. There are a number of tapes of historic broadcasts of Idaho radio and television stations, including the initial sign-on broadcasts of several Idaho radio and television stations.
collection_holder_name: The History of Idaho Broadcasting Foundation, Inc.
collection.historical_relevance: The History of Idaho Broadcasting Foundation is the state�s most recognized authority on information, historic artifacts, and old broadcasting equipment in Idaho. We can help the Radio Preservation Task Force (RPTF) identify existing archives of recorded radio sound in Idaho and assist RPTF in developing both strategies and tools to further the preservation of historical broadcast content, both in Idaho and throughout the nation. Our Foundation is presently locating and chronicling commercial, public, and educational radio recordings, both locally and regionally. We have developed a digital library of these various audio tracks, and are in the process of producing a complete preservation guide.
